officialTitle: A Phase 4 Long-term Follow-up Study to Define the Safety Profile of Radium-223 Dichloride
inclusionCriteria:
* Subject was previously enrolled in a selected company sponsored feeder trial, and has received at least 1 dose of radium 223 dichloride or placebo in the feeder trial
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Not applicable to this follow up study
